blogPost.excerpt: HeadScroll is a product that helps musicians play instruments. It allows them to navigate their music sheets, chords, or tabs by simply tilting their head. The product is in beta, but we're looking forward to hear your early feedback! ğŸ˜Š

We surveyed over 10,000 independent workers in design, engineering, product, writing, content marketing & social media on the what, how, and why of their work. Read the full report http://www.contra.com/freelance-industry-report-2021!
